text: Looks like this side project is about to get started
Nice!
Yeee im pretty excited
Ill learn a lot really quick i think
I picked up a ticket that a dev did 75% of the work on. The one piece he didn't do isn't possible with the way he wrote it :neutral_face:
which explains why he dropped it
Lol
A dev inside your company?
yeah
He wrote a database trigger on before create which means the records aren't assigned Id's yet
the piece of the ticket he didn't do is linking to another record
well if you don't have an Id you can't link them
Lol
Are any of you familiar with python enough to answer a question?
Yes
why the fuck wont truncate work

```import urllib2
import json
import os.path

 
response = urllib2.urlopen("<https://verge-blockchain.info/ext/getbalance/DLMHGfLPdpaJarFBiynqnmwRRAcooG1AmH>")
data = json.load(response)

newBalance = data
	

f = open("existingBalance.txt","rw") 
balance = float(f.readline())
f.truncate()
f.close()

if newBalance == balance:
    print(newBalance-balance)```
i also tried to do f.truncate(0) to put the "cursor" at the beginning of the txt file
What do you think truncate does?
truncates text in the file based on where the cursor is
The cursor is at the end in your case
ik but i also tried f.truncate(0)
<https://www.tutorialspoint.com/python/file_truncate.htm>

text: Thatâ€™s saying truncate nothing
i was just on there. trying running that lol
guess i gotta make it ugly like this

```f = open("existingBalance.txt","r+") 
balance = float(f.readline())
f.close()
open("existingBalance.txt","w").close()```
